comments.en:
It prints with Gimp-Print 4.1.5 or later.

This printer comes with a USB interface only!

If you modify your Ghostscript Uniprint file stcXXX.upp as described on http://www.qbik.ch/usb/devices/ you get only empty sheets being spilled out.

You have no switches to eject paper, put it offline, power off, or change cartdriges. All this functionality has to be done by software. Jean-Jacques Sarton has written a graphical utility named "mtink" which does all maintenance tasks on Epson inkjets, as nozzle check, had cleaning head alignment, and even changing cartridges on the Epson Stylus Color 480/580.

Consumables/Refills: Ink cartridges vendor numbers: Black TN013, Color TN014
